name: quantity
description: A template for creating a pepperi addon with an angular app for the client-side & a typescript nodejs app for the server-side

scripts.build: cd ./client-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm run build && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.init: npm i && cd ./client-side && npm i --force && cd .. && cd ./server-side && npm i && cd .. && cd ./cpi-side && npm i && cd ..
scripts.cpi-publish-addon: cd ./cpi-side && npm run build:debug && cd .. && cpi-node-debug
